title: Student Care Fee Assistance (SCFA)
description: Provides fee assistance for children from lower-income working families enrolled in MSF-registered Student Care Centres (SCCs).

title: ComCare Interim Assistance
description: Provides immediate financial assistance for lower-income individuals or families who require urgent and temporary financial relief.

title: ComCare Short-to-Medium Term Assistance (SMTA)
description: Provides temporary financial assistance for lower-income individuals or families who are temporarily unable to work, looking for a job or earning a low income and require assistance.

title: DigitalAccess@Home Scheme
description: Provides subsidised broadband and laptops/tablets to lower-income households to support their lifestyle needs, including work and social activities.

title: GST Voucher (GSTV) - Service and Conservancy Charges (S&CC) Rebate
description: 1.5 to 3.5 months of Service and Conservancy Charges (S&CC) Rebate for Singaporean households living in HDB flats every year.

title: Public Rental Scheme - Joint Singles Scheme (JSS)
description: Provides heavily subsidised flats for Singaporeans who are single and have no other housing options.

title: Public Rental Scheme - Family Scheme
description: Provides heavily subsidised rental flats for Singaporean households with no other housing options.

title: Healthcare Schemes and Subsidies - Healthcare Scheme
description: Provides subsidised healthcare options for Singaporeans who are eligible.

title: Financial assistance for school (FAS)
description: Provides subsidised school fees and other school expenses for eligible Singaporeans.

title: Financial assistance for Singapore Polytechnic students
description: Provides subsidised full-time diploma courses school fees for eligible Singaporeans.

title: Basic living expenses for lower-income households
description: Provides basic living expenses for lower income households.

title: Enterprise Financing Scheme
description: It covers seven areas to address enterprises' financing needs: green loans, working capital loans, fixed asset loans, venture debt loans, trade loans, project loans, as well as Merger & Acquisition loans.
